overview: "MILF: A Darker Side" is Kendo's latest erotic exploration into the attractive nature of the sexually experienced and demanding woman. By her refined seductive manners, she controls every aspect of the art of making love, and although she does take the lead into a journey in which the chemistry between her and her lover rises to new heights, she too explores the rough and yet undefined edges of her own sexual boundaries.
title: MILF: A Darker Side
